p.s: Beliefs and spirituality are an important part of our lives .
Not only to get answers to spiritual questions , but also to identify in a group , to not feel rejected .
How to decide when you do n't know your own beliefs ?

head.s: Understanding the Difference Between Religion and Atheism

list.item:
Know the definitions .
Most of the time , we look for answers without even understanding the question .
What does it mean to be religious ?
To be an atheist ?
You will notice that the definitions of these words are n't as clear as they may seem , and everybody has their own opinion on what they actually mean .
Clearly understanding the meanings of these words will help you understand exactly what you are looking for .
Religion : 1 .
The belief in and worship of a superhuman controlling power , especially a personal God or gods . 2 .
A particular system of faith and worship . 3 .
A pursuit or interest to which someone gives supreme importance .
Religious : Relating to or believing in a religion .
Atheism : 1 .
Disbelief or lack of belief in the existence of God or gods . 2 .
Skepticism , being unsure about whether or not a god or gods exist .
Atheist : 1 .
A person who disbelieves or lacks belief in the existence of God or gods . 2 .
A person who has no spiritual beliefs .

item.s: Learn about your subjects .
Knowing is good , but learning by yourself is better .
Do research on atheism , on the religion that interests you , get the definitions clear in your mind .
Understand what it means to choose a religion , to choose to be atheist , or even to create your own beliefs .
Because a religion is made to understand things we ca n't explain better , and if you have your own beliefs , you do n't have to pick a religion .
The research will also help you see all the sides of the medal , so you do n't have prejudice and you can stay open-minded .
Note your impressions .
Get a notebook and write everything about religions that interest you , about being an atheist , about anything you need .
That way , you will stay organized .
Do it logically .
Make a list of pros and cons for each religion ( including atheism ) in your notebook .
Write as many arguments as you can .
Try to see if one religion comes out more frequently , has more pros or more cons , or has more interesting pros or cons .
You can also compare them with categories , such as holidays , restrictions , general beliefs , etc.
You can also ask your family and friends what they think , and see if they come up with pros or cons you did n't think of .
Basically , try to get a visual representation of what happens in your mind to help you get your ideas clear .
Do it spiritually .
Do meditation before going to bed , and think about your most profound beliefs .
Let your heart guide you .
Check out videos on YouTube on how to meditate .
Plus , if you do it before going to sleep , your subconscious will work on it during the night and you will have clearer ideas in the morning .
The basic concept here is to see where your mind tells you to go , to follow your guts and to be open-minded .
Try it out !
If one religion comes out more , always pops up in your mind , or you have any feeling this could be what you want , try adopting the religion for a year .
If you think this is how you want to live , if you think this is what you believe in , then good job !
You have made your choice .
If not , try again from the beginning .
Maybe you would prefer a religion that you did n't yet think of , or maybe you prefer not knowing and simply following the flow of life , seeing where it will lead you .
In the end , it all comes to you .
Always remember that you can switch if you do n't like the religion you chose .
Talk to people of the religions that interest you .
Nothing is better than talking to someone who lived it to tell you more about that religion !
Never base your decisions on what others may think of you .
Never base your decisions on prejudice .
Not being open-minded will hide great opportunities from you .
Base your decisions mostly on beliefs .
If you love your religion but do n't believe in the god of that religion , you should quit and search for what you really believe in .
